revision.text: Questlines are special kinds of Quests where the player follows a series of steps to unlock progress in the current [[Region]], unlock certain mechanics or receive different rewards like Items and Pok√©mon. Some are activated at certain points of the game while others require the player to check a Bulletin Board. For the list of randomly generated Quests, please check the corresponding [[Quests]] page instead.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
